name: BallSpace
description:
[ About ]

BallSpace is a game where the the player plays as a ball in which he/she is required to collect all the energy in the space before proceeding towards the end portal. 

There is a total of 3 levels where each level have different obstacles such as moving platforms / walls and empty gaps. Player must avoid this obstacles and collect energy while the time keeps on running.

[ Controls ]

W / A / S / D - Movement

Mouse - Look around
